Tip of the Day
Make sure you equip your items to get their effects, most don't work from inventory alone.

The gleaming topaz and burnished silver appear as if a sun and moon are wrapped around your finger.

The Silver topaz ring item is a crafted item.

Requirements

This item has no requirements to use it.

Attributes

Quality Attributes

Global +1% Fine material finding
Global +0.25% No materials consumed

Global +2% Fine material finding
Global +0.5% No materials consumed

Global +3% Fine material finding
Global +0.75% No materials consumed

Global +4% Fine material finding
Global +1% No materials consumed

Global +5% Fine material finding
Global +1.25% No materials consumed

Global +6% Fine material finding
Global +1.5% No materials consumed

Uses

Job Boards

Silver topaz ring can be requested from the following job:

Job Board Name Location Quantity Item Type Rewards
Blackspell Port job board Blackspell Port 4 +3  Erdwise Faction Reputation
1x   Trinketry chest
Blackspell Port job board Blackspell Port 2 +3  Erdwise Faction Reputation
1x   Chest of Erdwise
